serena.description: Provides semantic code analysis and intelligent editing capabilities for codebases. Enables symbol-based navigation, refactoring, and code understanding. Needed when working with large codebases that require precise code modifications, symbol searches, or understanding code relationships without reading entire files.

context7.description: Retrieves up-to-date documentation and code examples for libraries and frameworks. Used for looking up API references, usage patterns, and best practices. Needed when working with external libraries, learning new APIs, or verifying current library behavior and syntax.

chrome-devtools.description: Controls browsers using Chrome DevTools Protocol for automation and debugging. Enables web scraping, performance analysis, and browser interaction. Needed when automating browser tasks, debugging web applications, capturing screenshots, or analyzing network traffic and console logs.

playwright.description: Provides browser automation using Playwright framework for testing and interaction. Supports cross-browser testing, form filling, and page navigation. Needed for end-to-end testing, automated UI testing, web application interaction, or performing complex browser workflows across multiple browsers.
